thread.title: Finsbury Park toddlers: Boy dies and girl critically ill
thread.title_full: Finsbury Park toddlers: Boy dies and girl critically ill

title: Finsbury Park toddlers: Boy dies and girl critically ill
text:
These are external links and will open in a new window Close share panel Image caption The toddlers were at a flat in Wilberforce Road in Finsbury Park A one-year-old boy has died after being found injured at a north London flat. 
Police called to Wilberforce Road in Finsbury Park on Saturday night also discovered a girl the same age who remains in a critical condition. 
Both toddlers were taken to an east London hospital after the discovery at 23:10 GMT. The boy died in the early hours of Sunday. 
A Met Police spokesperson said inquiries were under way to "establish the full circumstances". 
No arrests have been made, but police added: "Next of kin are aware. 
"Formal identification awaits and a post-mortem examination will be scheduled in due course."
